data.title: Spine: issue with extending since 3.8
data.body: Hi guys! I notice that Spine extending don't work since 3.8 in JSB. What happens?

data.title: CCScrollView should override removeChild
data.body: Fixed issue: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/8396

data.title: [Web] Merge some transformation logic
data.body:
There are two sets of all the transform in logic
WebGL / Canvas

In fact, the inside of the logic can be merged

data.title: 关于Cocos Studio2.3.2的帧事件回调触发不正确的Bug
data.body:
HTML5版本的cocos2d-js, 在播放带有帧事件回调的动画时， 帧事件回调触发会在不正确的帧中触发， 经过与参考对比C++版本实现，有用户 发现并解决了此问题，我替他上传到GIT中。
这是代码链接：http://yunpan.cn/cHj9Q57Qf3v46 （提取码：f51d）

data.body: and also with a testcase.

data.title: [WEB] Improve ScrollView by eliminating out of clip nodes
data.body:
@ZhangMenghe Please link it to your PRs

And please add a test case to test the performance improvement

data.title: [Canvas] setClearColor cause opacity animation abnormal
Make Ref _referenceCounter thread-safe
data.body: This will add a performance overhead, as atomic operations are more expensive then just normal operations

data.title: Packed lite version can't run under WebGL mode

data.title: Fix socketio to work with servers v1.0+
data.body:
Fixes incorrect packet format by updating the separator between data fields for socketio v1.x packets

fixes #13929

data.title: [Request] 2d CCLightNode
data.body:
Would be cool to have a CCLightNode for 2d similar to SKLightNode on SpriteKit
with the following attributes (getter/setters)
- `categoryBitMask`
- `ambientColor`
- `lightColor`
- `falloff`

data.title: _defaultFBO释放问题
Added CC_PROPERTY const qualifier
data.body: CC_PROPERTY macro is inconsistent with others, get methods should be const.

data.body: Set js templates mac target to 10.8
